str2: Therefore, then. Apparently a primary word; certainly, or accordingly.
If. From ei and an; a conditional particle; in case that, provided, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
All, the whole, entire, complete. A primary word; 'whole' or 'all', i.e. Complete, especially as noun or adverb.
From a compound of ek and a derivative of kaleo; a calling out, i.e. a popular meeting, especially a religious congregation.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From sun and erchomai; to convene, depart in company with, associate with, or, cohabit.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: A prolonged form of an otherwise obsolete verb; to talk, i.e. Utter words.
The tongue; by implication, a language.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.
From idios; a private person, i.e. an ignoramus.
Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To go in, come in, enter. From eis and erchomai; to enter.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: Probably a fuller form of rheo; an alternate for epo in certain tenses; to utter, i.e. Speak or say.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

word: you are out of your minds?
parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To be raving mad, speak as a madman. Middle voice from a primary mao; to rave as a 'maniac'.
